name: astral
description: The god of EC2 instance creation and destruction

scripts.test: NODE_PATH=./shiva NODE_ENV=test lab -v -c -a code test/shiva/unit test/shiva/functional
scripts.init-db: createuser -s -d astral; createdb astral; createdb astral-test
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate-dev && npm run migrate-test
scripts.rollback: npm run rollback-dev && npm run rollback-test
scripts.queues: while true; do OP=$(rabbitmqctl list_queues); clear; echo "$OP"; sleep 0.5; done;
scripts.shiva-test: npm run shiva-lint && npm run shiva-eslint && NODE_PATH=./shiva NODE_ENV=test lab -m 1000 -v -c -a code test/shiva/unit test/shiva/functional
scripts.shiva-integraton-aws: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_PATH=./shiva lab -a code -v -m 300000 test/shiva/integration/providers/aws.js | bunyan
scripts.shiva-integration-server: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_PATH=./shiva lab -a code -v -m 300000 test/shiva/integration/server.js | bunyan

author: Ryan Sandor Richards <ryan@runnable.com> (http://www.runnable.com)
